è¡¨ç¤ºç›‘å¬æ²¡æœ‰å¯åŠ¨ã€‚

3ã€æ‰§è¡Œå¯åŠ¨ç›‘å¬ï¼Œé€šè¿‡å‘½ä»¤ï¼šlsnrctl start ï¼ˆlsnrctl stop å…³é—­ç›‘å¬ï¼‰

entry.title: oracle spool
entry.content:
å¯ç”¨äºå¯¼å‡ºæ•°æ®

#!/bin/sh
export NLS_LANG='SIMPLIFIED CHINESE_CHINA.UTF8'
ORA_NAME=dbname
ORA_USER=username
ORA_PASS=pass
sqlplus -S ${ORA_USER}/${ORA_PASS} << EOF
set echo off;
set feedback off;
set newpage none;
set verify off;
set pagesize 0;
set term off;
set trims on;
set linesize 10000;
set heading off;
set timing off;
set numwidth 38;
SPOOL /tmp/demo.sql;
SELECT
        'insert into Idcard(name,idNumMd5,idNum,createTime,flag) values("'||
        DWMC|| '","' ||
        md5(ZJHM)|| '","' ||
        ZJHM|| '",now(),"' ||
        JGDM||
        '");'
FROM
       Table
WHERE
        ZT=1
        and YL1=200;
SPOOL OFF;
exit
EOF

entry.title: PHP è°ƒç”¨httpsç±»å‹webserviceæ¥å£
entry.content:
$opts = array (
			'ssl' => array (
					'ciphers' => 'RC4-SHA',
					'verify_peer' => false,
					'verify_peer_name' => false 
			) 
	);
	// SOAP 1.2 client
	$params = array (
			'encoding' => 'UTF-8',
			'verifypeer' => false,
			'verifyhost' => false,
			'soap_version' => SOAP_1_1,
			'trace' => 1,
			'exceptions' => 1,
			"connection_timeout" => 180,
			'stream_context' => stream_context_create ( $opts ),
			'local_cert' => $local_cert, // clientè¯ä¹¦ä¿¡æ¯
			'passphrase' => 'client'  // å¯†ç 
		);
 
	;
	$soap = new SoapClient ( $wsdl, $params );
ä¾‹å­ï¼š
	<?php
header("content-type:text/html;charset=utf-8");
try {
	// è¦è¯·æ±‚çš„å†…å®¹ æ‰“æˆxml
	//xmlåŠ å¯†
	//å¯†é’¥ 
	//åç§»é‡ 
	//éšæœºæ•° 
	//ç”¨æˆ·
    $client = new SoapClient("https://192.168.3.12:8866/epic/query?wsdl",
        array(
            "stream_context" => stream_context_create(
                array(
                    'ssl' => array(
                        'verify_peer' => false,
                        'verify_peer_name' => false,
                    )
                )
            )
        )
    );
    //print_r($client->__getFunctions());
    //print_r($client->__getTypes());

    $parm = array('content' => 'inKkcE+e4h+1q5Rpm8hAqw0Ph8yYx3hlhUO/1dJqrhm4Y4p/ot7yhgnzg5cQj+3Whac+3gx5yfs1KVX/1U9TwugtKtMdRFwPxPbF27i+BmAh3gZN6SSMCvbvVmi2EBRgRxJEHBMrk52DCpUtC21nn4ECvkBUKBcf0vCnAVfB4Xs=', 'contentHash' => '0lh0DJh3A2j1ei7NhEAnYA==', 'random' => 'AUMIxMlN4IoZTuh3Gh6y', 'loginName' => 'glpt_user01');
    $result = $client->epic_ent_person_relation($parm);
    //print_r($result);

    //å°†stdclass objectçš„$resultè½¬æ¢ä¸ºarray
    $result = get_object_vars($result);
    //è¾“å‡ºç»“æœ 
    echo $result["return"];
   

} catch (SOAPFault $e) {
    print $e;
}
?>

entry.title: phpè¯ä»¶ç…§æ¢åº•è‰²
entry.content:
<?php
//èƒŒæ™¯å›¾å’ŒåŸå›¾éœ€è¦ä¿æŒå®½é«˜è¦ä¿æŒä¸€æ ·ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œçš„ç¤ºä¾‹åŸå›¾ç”¨çš„æ˜¯è“è‰²èƒŒæ™¯
init();
function init(){
    $old = '1.png';
    $new = '2.png';
    //åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªpngé€æ˜å›¾
    $img = imagecreatefrompng($old);
    setpng($img,$old,$new);
}
function setpng($imgid,$filename,$savename){
    $bg = 'bg.png';//èƒŒæ™¯å›¾
    $new = imagecreatefrompng($bg);//åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªpngé€æ˜å›¾
    list($width,$height)=getimagesize($filename);//è·å–é•¿å’Œå®½
    $white = imagecolorallocate($imgid,1,155,215);//é€‰æ‹©ä¸€ä¸ªæ›¿æ¢é¢œè‰²ã€‚è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯ç»¿è‰²
    cleancolor($imgid,$white);
    imagecolortransparent($imgid,$white);//æŠŠé€‰æ‹©çš„é¢œè‰²æ›¿æ¢æˆé€æ˜
    imagecopymerge($new,$imgid,0,0,0,0,$width,$height,100);//åˆå¹¶å›¾ç‰‡
    imagepng($new,$savename);//ä¿å­˜å›¾ç‰‡
    imagedestroy($imgid);//é”€æ¯
    imagedestroy($new);
    echo '<img src="'.$savename.'">';
}
function cleancolor($imgid,$color){
    $width = imagesx($imgid);//è·å–å®½
    $height = imagesy($imgid);//è·å–é«˜
    for($i=0;$i<$width;$i++){
        for($k=0;$k<$height;$k++){
            //å¯¹æ¯”æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªåƒç´ 
            $rgb = imagecolorat($imgid,$i,$k);
            $r = ($rgb >> 16)&0xff;//å–R
            $g = ($rgb >> 8)&0xff;//å–G
            $b = $rgb&0xff;//å–B
            $randr = 1.5;
            $randg = 1;
            $randb=1;
            //è“è‰²RGBå¤§è‡´çš„ä½ç½®ã€‚æ›¿æ¢æˆç»¿è‰²
            if($r<=65*$randr && $g<=225*$randg && $b<=255*$randb && $b*$randb>=100){
                //å¦‚æœèƒ½å¤Ÿç²¾ç¡®çš„è®¡ç®—å‡ºè¦ä¿ç•™ä½ç½®çš„ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥å†™ç»å¯¹çš„æ•°å­—
                if($i>=$width/2 && $i<=$width/2 && $k>=$height/2 && $k<=$height/2){
                    
                }else{
                    //æ”¹å˜é¢œè‰²
                    imagesetpixel($imgid,$i,$k,$color);
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

$oldæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯è¦å¤„ç†çš„å›¾ç‰‡ï¼ŒæŒ‡å®šä¸ºpngæ ¼å¼
$newæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯å¤„ç†åè¾“å‡ºçš„å›¾ç‰‡å
$bgæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯èƒŒæ™¯å›¾

ğŸ˜˜ Enjoy~
